154a4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
154a5(mdo 'grel): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyis ma shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
154a6(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa po ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
154a7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa ni byed pa po med pa'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/ / 'di dag gis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs gsungs so/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji
154b1(mdo 'grel): ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
154b2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin
154b3(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
154b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
154b5(mdo 'grel): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154b6(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzugs bde zhes bya
154b7(mdo 'grel): ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
155a1(mdo 'grel): do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
155a2(mdo 'grel): la spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang /
155a3(mdo 'grel): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags
155a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
155a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
155a6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
155a7(mdo 'grel): nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gzugs de ni med do/ /
155b1(mdo 'grel): gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni med do/ /de bzhin du gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde
155b2(mdo 'grel): ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags
155b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
155b4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de ni med do
155b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / //bam po sum cu dgu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o
155b6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang /
155b7(mdo 'grel): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin
156a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
156a2(mdo 'grel): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
156a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na
156a4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
156a5(mdo 'grel): do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes
156a6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
156a7(mdo 'grel): kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
156b1(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/
156b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
156b3(mdo 'grel): tshe/ gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
156b4(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /mig chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
156b5(mdo 'grel): la spyod do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
156b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
156b7(mdo 'grel): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad
157a1(mdo 'grel): chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
157a2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na
157a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang /
157a4(mdo 'grel): skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
157a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
157a6(mdo 'grel): chos ma 'dres pa rnams chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
157a7(mdo 'grel): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa dang bcas pa dang / ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa
157b1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /de skad ces
157b2(mdo 'grel): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang yongs
157b3(mdo 'grel): su mi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med
157b4(mdo 'grel): do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /nam mkha' ni bsngags pa brjod kyang mi 'phel ba med do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang mi 'grib pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni
157b5(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /bsngags pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ /bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de
157b6(mdo 'grel): bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa na sems zhum pa dang /
157b7(mdo 'grel): g.yengs par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir brtson par byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa na dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha
158a1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'i slad du ste/ nam mkha' la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha
158a2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni gzugs su btags pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar ma mchis so/ /'du shes su ma mchis/ 'du byed rnams su ma
158a3(mdo 'grel): mchis/ nam mkha' la ni rnam par shes par btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
158a4(mdo 'grel): du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni yang dag par spong pa rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
158a5(mdo 'grel): lam rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rnam
158a6(mdo 'grel): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
158a7(mdo 'grel): gzungs kyi sgo rnams su btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir
158b1(mdo 'grel): btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni
158b2(mdo 'grel): lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dgra bcom pa nyid du btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rang byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btags pa ma mchis so/ /
158b3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni nam mkha'i don du sbyor bar 'tshal/ bskul bar 'tshal/ khyab par 'tshal ba
158b4(mdo 'grel): dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa de dag ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
158b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha bgos pa'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba dka' ba'i sbyor ba yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'chal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la ldeg par 'tshal ba'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dka' ba
158b6(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong
158b7(mdo 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las
159a1(mdo 'grel): lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'bri ba'am gang bar btags pa mi gda'o/ /de ci'i
159a2(mdo 'grel): slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/
159a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras kyi zhing ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa
159a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can gyi khams la 'bri ba'am gang bar btags pa mi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par
159a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o zhes bya ba ni las bya dka' ba nyid kyi sbyor ba yin no/ / de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag
159a6(mdo 'grel): pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung por gdags su yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung por gdags su yod / shes rab kyi phung por gdags su yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung por gdags su yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung por gdags su yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
159a7(mdo 'grel): 'bras bur gdags su yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags su yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags su yod/ rang byang chub tu gdags su yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
159b1(mdo 'grel): gdags su yod/ dkon mchog gsum du gdags su yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gdags su yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang zhes bya ba ni don yod pa'i sbyor ba yin no/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa
159b2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
159b3(mdo 'grel): bslab par bya bar sems pa de dag ni nam mkha' la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/
159b4(mdo 'grel): klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba ji lta bu zhig tu bgyi/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
159b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
159b6(mdo 'grel): mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na de la mi'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka
159b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa de dag ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa'o/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang /
160a1(mdo 'grel): rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang
160a2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/
160a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
160a4(mdo 'grel): rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la
160a5(mdo 'grel): bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba
160a6(mdo 'grel): bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yin no/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na
160a7(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur chos thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
160b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
160b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba yin te/ 'di dag gis ni sbyor ba gsungs so/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub
160b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi
160b4(mdo 'grel): lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi
160b5(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi
160b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi
160b7(mdo 'grel): byed/ de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
161a1(mdo 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
161a2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su
161a3(mdo 'grel): mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
161a4(mdo 'grel): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /
161a5(mdo 'grel): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral pa rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang /
161a6(mdo 'grel): tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
161a7(mdo 'grel): lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di
161b1(mdo 'grel): nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu bar byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa sems kyis mthong
161b2(mdo 'grel): bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs rnams dang / mtshams rnams thams cad na sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
161b3(mdo 'grel): zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / thams cad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu bar byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to / /
161b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de
161b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
161b6(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug po dbang du gyur par shes par byed pa yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems
161b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
162a1(mdo 'grel): pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med
162a2(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba'am/ sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces
162a3(mdo 'grel): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar
162a4(mdo 'grel): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am/
162a5(mdo 'grel): da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
162a6(mdo 'grel): sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
162a7(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams
162b1(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
162b2(mdo 'grel): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba
162b3(mdo 'grel): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub
162b4(mdo 'grel): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
162b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / rnam pa thams
162b6(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
162b7(mdo 'grel): 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
163a1(mdo 'grel): dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
163a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
163a3(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji
163a4(mdo 'grel): ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ de bzhin du phung po
163a5(mdo 'grel): dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
163a6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
163a7(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
163b1(mdo 'grel): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par
163b2(mdo 'grel): shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
163b3(mdo 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
163b4(mdo 'grel): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
163b5(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
163b6(mdo 'grel): nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du
163b7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab
164a1(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam
164a2(mdo 'grel): mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun
164a3(mdo 'grel): 'byung la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
164a4(mdo 'grel): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha
164a5(mdo 'grel): snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
164a6(mdo 'grel): na/ nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no/ / gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med
164a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang
164b1(mdo 'grel): brjod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
164b2(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab
164b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
164b4(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma
164b5(mdo 'grel): mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes
164b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan
164b7(mdo 'grel): 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus rgas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
165a1(mdo 'grel): ni mi bde ba spangs nas dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na
165a2(mdo 'grel): chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du
165a3(mdo 'grel): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
165a4(mdo 'grel): kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir
165a5(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas las
165a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen por skye bar
165a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
165b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do/ /de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs sA la chen
165b2(mdo 'grel): po rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba
165b3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'od chung gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'od gsal gyi lha
165b4(mdo 'grel): rnams yod do/ /dge chung gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do/ /bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /
165b5(mdo 'grel): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /rab lta'i lha rnams yod do/ /legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
165b6(mdo 'grel): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na
165b7(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na / bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
166a1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
166a2(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do/ /
166a3(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod do/ /
166a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod do/ /mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs
166a5(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do/ /
166a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do/ /chos dkon mchog yod do/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to/ /de bas na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni
166a7(mdo 'grel): lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/
166b1(mdo 'grel): kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am / kha na ma tho ba dang
166b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas pa'am / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
166b3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/
166b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ de ltar
166b5(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti
166b6(mdo 'grel): stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
166b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te/ 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no/ / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin/ mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin/
167a1(mdo 'grel): ston par byed pa ma yin/ mi ston par byed pa ma yin/ ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ skye bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ 'chad par byed pa ma yin/ rtag par byed pa ma yin/ don gcig par byed pa ma yin/ don sna tshogs pa
167a2(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ 'ong bar byed pa ma yin/ 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das par ma yin/ ma 'ongs par ma yin/ da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad
167a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o/ / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/
167a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs dang / smon
167a5(mdo 'grel): lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/
167a6(mdo 'grel): 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
167a7(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa
167b1(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par
167b2(mdo 'grel): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma
167b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/
167b4(mdo 'grel): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste/ gnyis
167b5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ / //bam po bzhi bcu pa/ rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ster ba'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
167b6(mdo 'grel): ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa'am/ 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin
167b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par
168a1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga zha phyung
168a2(mdo 'grel): nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos
168a3(mdo 'grel): kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos
168a4(mdo 'grel): gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i
168a5(mdo 'grel): slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
168a6(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
168a7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /tshad med pa dang / bsam
168b1(mdo 'grel): gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par
168b2(mdo 'grel): thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
168b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /
168b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /
168b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
168b6(mdo 'grel): dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ /chos thams
168b7(mdo 'grel): cad kyi rang bzhin yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par
169a1(mdo 'grel): 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis yongs su mi mthong ba yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang bskor bar
169a2(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyi ba'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi
169a3(mdo 'grel): bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / brjod pa dang / btags pa dang / rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang /
169a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par dgrol ba dang / mtshon pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung / gang sus kyang ma
169a5(mdo 'grel): bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni gang sus kyang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par
169a6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa ste gsum pa'o/ / 'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs so/ /'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa las thams cad shes pas dbang du byas pa spyod
169a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
169b1(mdo 'grel): 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mi dmigs par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
169b2(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
169b3(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni brdzi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
169b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med
169b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
169b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
169b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
170a1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zad pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol
170a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
170a3(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med
170a4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
170a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dul
170a6(mdo 'grel): ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dul ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
170a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab
170b1(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs dang gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
170b2(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
170b3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
170b4(mdo 'grel): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa can gyi
170b5(mdo 'grel): sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
170b6(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
170b7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi
171a1(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
171a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
171a3(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
171a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad phyin ci ma log par de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
171a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
171a6(mdo 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
171a7(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems
171b1(mdo 'grel): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
171b2(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
171b3(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
171b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchog tu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
171b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
171b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal bya ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i
171b7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
172a1(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par
172a2(mdo 'grel): chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
172a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
172a4(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
172a5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs
172a6(mdo 'grel): su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
172a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
172b1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
172b2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
172b3(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma
172b4(mdo 'grel): byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
172b5(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa
172b6(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
172b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
173a1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
173a2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
173a3(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum la dus gsum po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
173a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran
173a5(mdo 'grel): pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i
